titles.title: A resolution commending Bob Hope for his dedication and commitment to the Nation.
A resolution commending Bob Hope for his dedication and commitment to the Nation.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced on June 10, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Commends Bob Hope for his dedication and commitment to the United States. Expresses appreciation for his example of philanthropy and public service.
